segments.text: Those children are quite the team, I must say.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching for that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly wobbly beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little fingers are already inside the jar, grabbing something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's face is pure anticipation, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has her hand out, ready to catch the loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic secret cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so focused on their mission, completely oblivious to the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just a few feet away, but she's in her own world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope that stool doesn't give way; it's practically vertical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a sweet, mischievous moment, despite the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll be so happy with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
